original_text: But when he heard that Archelaus was reigning in Judea in place of his father Herod, he was afraid to go there. Having been warned in a dream, he withdrew to the district of Galilee,
korean_text: 그러나 아켈라오가 그의 아버지 헤롯을 이어 유대의 임금 됨을 듣고 거기로 가기를 무서워하더니 꿈에 지시하심을 받아 갈릴리 지방으로 떠나가

sentences.original_text: But when he heard that Archelaus was reigning
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아르켈라오스가 다스리고 있다는 소식을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: in Judea in place of his father Herod
he was afraid to go there
Having been warned in a dream
he withdrew to the district of Galilee
